job.title: Geospatial Data Analyst-US Citizen
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: DescriptionJob Description:Successful Candidates Will Possess The Following Minimum Required SkillsThe Geospatial Data Analyst position directly supports key customer mission requirements for maritime safety of navigation. The position requires GIS skills to analyze, manipulate, convert, and transform geographic data into military specified compliance, while maintaining weekly and monthly milestone schedule requirements.Strong maritime product knowledge and GIS background who can demonstrate effective throughputDirect experience with Electronic Navigational Chart (ENC) and/or Digital Nautical Chart (DNC)Esri ArcGIS software experience, to include updating geodatabases in ArcMap, managing data in ArcCatalog, utilizing Product Libraries, and various data editing toolbarsKeen attention to detail and rigorous organizational skillsGood communication, willingness to learn, and adaptive skills in order to coordinate & contribute in a team environmentBachelors and 3+ years of professional GIS experience required or additional years of experience in lieu of degreeNo clearance is required, but only those who are eligible to receive one should applyDesired SkillsExperience with GIS data conversion and cross-product schema mapping would be a plusSQL and Python experience would be a plusPotential opportunity for telework.External Referral BonusIneligibleExternal Referral Bonus $:Potential For TeleworkYes, 75%Clearance Level RequiredNoneTravelNoPay Range#Remote
